name: Hasan Khara
personality: Disciplined and determined, but somewhat introverted
story: Hasan Khara grew up in a small town in Iran. He joined the military at age 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional discipline and tactical thinking. He has been promoted to Sergeant and assigned as a Crewman in the OPFOR faction. Despite his quiet nature, he is respected by his peers for his abilities.
